projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: AI-Based Code Reviewer
projects.bodyText: Built an AI-powered code review system using Go and Fiber, integrating Google Gemini API to automate code analysis and reduce manual review time by 30%.

projects.title: AI-Powered Assignment Generator
projects.bodyText: Developed a full-stack app using Gemini API to auto-generate assignment questions, cutting 40% of manual effort.Built RESTful APIs with Node.js, a React frontend, and MySQL for secure course and question storage.
